sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This is fix script is written to populate the classification, issue type in case of triage risk issue and type is incident or loss event and confirmed date for existing issue.</description> <name>populateIssueclassificationIssueType</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[//Execute a scheduled script job var rec = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); rec.get('name', 'populate_issue_classification_issue_type'); gs.executeNow(rec);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-16 07:46:03</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6ba1932cc73520107e299e0703c260a4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>populateIssueclassificationIssueType</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6ba1932cc73520107e299e0703c260a4</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-01-16 09:31:01</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
